settings.content:
• Ultra Slim Foldable Running Board For Easy Storage: This WalkingPad foldable treadmill P1 adopts ultra slim high strength aluminum frame design with patented hinged folding running board, the size of this walking pad is 56inch x 21.5inch and only 32inch x 21.5inch when folding, the thickness of this pad is just 5inch equal to the thickness of the door, it can be easily hidden under the sofa or bed, it is only 62lbs for you to take away.
  • Smart Gravity Foot Sensing Speed Control: To avoid fall down risk on the speed walking pad, this foldable treadmill P1 built with high sensitive gravity sensors to support speed control, you will easy to feel the front accelerate area, middle uniform speed area and back decelerate area, and the whole process is automatically controlled by your foot position.
  • Exquisite Remote Control With High Definition Monitor: This WalkingPad treadmill P1 uses wireless remote control which is creative designed with finger-feel key and high definition screen, you can use this remote to do on/off, manual/automatic, accelerate/decelerate, start/pause function and also with the speed/time/millage/calories display, the speed accuracy is +/- 0.5MPH and range is 0.5~3.72MPH, and this walking pad is not only used in walking but also widely used in jogging.
  • Durable Walking Pad With High Technology Material: This smart WalkingPad treadmill P1 is made of high strength die-casting aluminum (frame), patent wear-resisting material (EVA buffer layer), high density wooden board (running board), durable plastic cover, high friction PVC belt (running belt), durable ABS protective bar (side bar), all the parts pass the strictly quality test and machine aging test, which could be used for long time with high frequency.
  • Customer First, Services Foremost: WalkingPad always aim at providing the best products and top service for every buyer friends, if you aren't satisfied with the foldable walking pad P1 for any reason, just reach out to us and we'll be happy to resolve any issues you may face. Our average response time is 12 hrs or less.

settings.text: Powerful PerformanceThe powerful 125 Horsepower Motor provides a large carrying capacity of up to 240 lbs. The sturdy treadmill allows you to run up to 6.2 mph on the frame and walk up to 3.7 mph under your desk.
Welcome to a better way to work
